country.country_description: Mastralia is a peaceful, lush planet located in the outer reaches of the Milky Way. It is home to many unique species and cultures, as well as a variety of flora and fauna.
country.people_description: The people of Mastralia are a diverse group, ranging from the technophile Mentriaxian traders to the nomadic Nariastrian tribes. They are generally friendly and welcoming to outsiders.
country.language_description: Nariastrian is a language spoken by the native inhabitants of Mastralia. It is a combination of complex syntax and ornate wordplay, making it quite difficult to learn.
